headline: Is Leidos Holdings Still a Bargain After Securing a Major Federal Contract in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Leidos Holdings is priced right, undervalued, or already priced for perfection? Let’s take a clear-eyed look at the stock’s current standing and see if there’s real upside left. Recently, Leidos shares have seen some steady movement, gaining 2.1% this week and 1.2% over the last month, with an impressive 32.8% gain year-to-date. Big-picture headlines have kept investor interest high. For example, the recent announcement of a major new federal contract and ongoing momentum in...
